required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Drug Interaction Study With Rifampicin and Afatinib
clinical_study.official_title: Relative Bioavailability of a Single Oral Dose of 40 mg Afatinib Given Alone and After Multiple Doses of Rifampicin - an Open-label, Two-period, Fixed Sequence Clinical Phase I Trial in Healthy Male Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of the current study is to investigate the effect of the P-gp inducer rifampicin on the pharmacokinetics (PK) of afatinib in healthy male volunteers

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under Curve From 0 to Infinity Hours (AUC0-∞)
primary_outcome.description: AUC0-∞ represents the area under the concentration-time curve of the analyte in plasma over the time interval from 0 extrapolated to infinity.

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under Curve From 0 to tz (AUC0-tz)
primary_outcome.description: AUC0-tz represents the area under the concentration-time curve of the analyte in plasma over the time interval from 0 to the last quantifiable drug plasma concentration.
Cmax represents the maximum concentration of the analyte in plasma.

secondary_outcome.measure: Time From Dosing to the Maximum Concentration of Afatinib in Plasma (Tmax)
secondary_outcome.description: tmax represents the time from dosing to the maximum concentration of the analyte in plasma

secondary_outcome.measure: Terminal Half-life of Afatinib in Plasma (t1/2)
secondary_outcome.description: t1/2 represents the terminal half-life of the analyte in plasma

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under Curve From 0 to 24 h (AUC0-24)
secondary_outcome.description: AUC0-24 represents the area under the concentration-time curve of the analyte in plasma over the time interval from 0 to 24 hours (h)

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of the AUCtz-∞ Obtained by Extrapolation (%AUCtz-∞)
secondary_outcome.description: %AUCtz-∞ represents the percentage of the AUCtz-∞ obtained by extrapolation

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean Residence Time of Afatinib in the Body After Oral Administration (MRTpo)
secondary_outcome.description: MRTpo represents the mean residence time of the analyte in the body after oral administration

secondary_outcome.measure: Apparent Clearance of Afatinib in the Plasma After Extravascular Administration (CL/F)
secondary_outcome.description: CL/F represents the apparent clearance of the analyte in the plasma after extravascular administration

secondary_outcome.measure: Apparent Volume of Distribution During the Terminal Phase lambda_z Following an Extravascular Dose (V_z/F)
secondary_outcome.description: V_z/F represents the apparent volume of distribution during the terminal phase λz following an extravascular dose

arm_group.description: Tablet, Oral administration with 240 mL of water
Tablet, Oral administration with 240 mL of water

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria:
Healthy male volunteers
Exclusion criteria:
Any relevant deviations from healthy conditions

group.title: Overall Group
group.description: Subjects were treated with a single morning dose of Afatinib 40mg on Day 1.

group.title: Overall Study
group.description: This was a open-label, two period, fixed sequence trial clinical phase I trial in healthy male volunteers.

outcome.title: Area Under Curve From 0 to Infinity Hours (AUC0-∞)
outcome.description: AUC0-∞ represents the area under the concentration-time curve of the analyte in plasma over the time interval from 0 extrapolated to infinity.
outcome.population: PK analysis set - all subjects of the treated set who provided at least 1 observation for at least 1 primary PK endpoint in any trial period without important protocol violations relevant to the evaluation for PL, and who did not experience vomiting at or before 2 times median tmax for afatinib.

group.title: Afatinib
group.description: Subjects were treated with a single morning dose of Afatinib 40mg on Day 1.

group.title: Afatinib + Rifa
group.description: Subjects were treated with Rifa 600mg once daily (evening) from Day -7 to -1 and with a single morning dose of Afatinib 40mg on Day 1.

measure.title: Area Under Curve From 0 to Infinity Hours (AUC0-∞)
measure.description: AUC0-∞ represents the area under the concentration-time curve of the analyte in plasma over the time interval from 0 extrapolated to infinity.
measure.population: PK analysis set - all subjects of the treated set who provided at least 1 observation for at least 1 primary PK endpoint in any trial period without important protocol violations relevant to the evaluation for PL, and who did not experience vomiting at or before 2 times median tmax for afatinib.

analysis.estimate_desc: The standard deviation is actually the geometric coefficient of variation

outcome.title: Area Under Curve From 0 to tz (AUC0-tz)
outcome.description: AUC0-tz represents the area under the concentration-time curve of the analyte in plasma over the time interval from 0 to the last quantifiable drug plasma concentration.
outcome.population: PK analysis set - all subjects of the treated set who provided at least 1 observation for at least 1 primary PK endpoint in any trial period without important protocol violations relevant to the evaluation for PL, and who did not experience vomiting at or before 2 times median tmax for afatinib.

reported_events.time_frame: First administration of trial medication until 6 days after last administration of trial medication

certain_agreements.pi_employee: All Principal Investigators ARE employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: Any publication of the result of this trial must be consistent with the Boehringer Ingelheim publication policy. The rights of the investigator and of the sponsor with regard to publication of the results of this trial are described in the investigator contract.
